tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: An empathetic dentist who takes the time to listen to his patients and helps them feel comfortable during the procedure. I visited Dr.Darshan to know my options for a dental implant. He advised a guided implant surgery keeping in mind my health conditions and my fear of getting the procedure done.  Enough anesthesia was provided during the surgery to keep me comfortable. The drilling is a bit overwhelming but it's a part of the process. Now 10 days later I'm doing much better! I'm really glad I chose the guided surgery instead of the traditional one as the healing appears to be moving smoothly without much discomfort. Thank you Dr. Darshan!
reply_text: Thank you ANUPAMA for your kind words!!Your comfort and happiness is our priority!!Glad you made the right decision!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Post and Core,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
My experience at the Dental Care Solutions Clinic at Ghatkopar has always been Exceptional! 

Dr. Darshan goes an extra mile to put you at ease. He is not only a knowledgeable and skilled Professional; but also a genuine person, who is out there to offer you the best possible Treatment and Care! His USP is his 'Calm and Composed Demeanor' and 'Impeccable Surgical Hands'! 

P.S : The  Pristine Ambience  of the Clinic and the Warm and Welcoming Hospitality of his Team Members and his Staff is an 'Icing on the Cake'! 

Remarkable and Recommendable!! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I wanted to express my sincere gratitude for the exceptional care and treatment I received at your clinic. From the moment I walked through your doors until the completion of my dental journey, your team consistently demonstrated professionalism, expertise, and genuine concern for my well-being

When I first approached your clinic with my missing front teeth, lost due to a fall during my teenage years, I was unsure if restoring my smile was even possible. However, your dedicated team reassured me and presented a comprehensive treatment plan that involved braces and eventually implants.

Throughout the braces phase, your orthodontist Dr. Vishal Mehta worked diligently to align my teeth
flawlessly, ensuring a solid foundation for the subsequent implant procedure. The patience and skill they exhibited were truly commendable They guided me through each step of the process, addressing my concerns and providing me with the necessary information to make informed decisions.

The implant treatment, which was performed by you and your talented surgeon DR RUTUJ SURANA, was a testament to their expertise. They meticulously crafted and placed the implants, resulting in a natural-looking smile that I now adore. The attention to detail and precision they demonstrated during the procedure left me feeling confident and reassured.

Moreover, the friendly and compassionate nature of your staff made each visit a pleasant experience. They went above and beyond to create a comfortable environment, easing any anxiety or apprehension I may have had.

I cannot thank you enough for the remarkable transformation you have brought to my life. My newfound smile has instilled a sense of confidence that extends beyond my appearance. I am grateful for the outstanding care I received at your clinic and will gladly recommend your services to anyone seeking top-notch dental treatment.

Warmest regards,
Amol kadam
reply_text: THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR FEEDBACK

review: I had a positive experience with Dr. Darshan Seth and his staff during my regular dental checkups and a very recent wisdom tooth extraction. The team was professional, attentive, and ensured a comfortable environment. Dr. Darshan and Dr. Vishal Patil's expertise was evident in the successful and relatively painless extraction. The post-care instructions provided were clear, contributing to a smooth recovery. Overall, I highly recommend Dr. Darshan Seth and his team for dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Since my mom is aged she was so tensed about extraction of tooth and the pain during and after extraction. But the Doctor spoke to her in a friend ly way and made her relax explained her the procedure and convince d her that it is just a piece of cake. After the extraction she was so relieved that she mentioned like it never happened. It was just yesterday and till today she is not feeling a bit pain and finding it normal. The doctor not only took care of the extraction but also took care of the infection in the gums. Thanks to the doctor for such a nice experience.
